overview: Every day after school, Charlie works at the town's outdoor pool. When he doesn't sell hot dogs or cleans, he dreams about Evelina. They go to the same school, but she doesn't know who he is.  Meanwhile, somewhere far away in she sky, a comet is moving closer and closer. But Charlie seems to be the only one who can actually see it. It is almost as if it is trying to tell him something.
tagline: "Pojkvän" is a story about love, based on Tjuvjakt's album with the same name.
title: Pojkvän
